TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScaffoldTableAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定类或数据表是否使用基架。

span.span: Specifies whether a class or data table uses scaffolding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是用于基于数据库架构生成网页模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism for generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架生成基于 Web 的 UI, 该 UI 使用户能够查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 此类使用属性在动态数据网站中启用单个表的基架。This class uses the property to enable scaffolding of individual tables in a Dynamic Data Web Site. 基架通过动态显示基于数据模型的页面, 而不需要任何物理页面, 从而增强了 ASP.NET 页框架。Scaffolding enhances the ASP.NET page framework by dynamically displaying pages based on the data model with no physical pages required. 基架提供以下内容:Scaffolding provides the following: - 创建数据驱动的 Web 应用程序所需的最少或无代码。Minimal or no code to create a data-driven Web application. - 快速开发。Quick development time. - 完全正常运行的页面, 包括显示、插入、编辑、删除、排序和分页功能。Pages that are fully functional, including display, insert, edit, delete, sorting, and paging functionalities. - 基于数据库架构的内置数据验证。Built-in data validation based on the database schema. - 为每个外键或布尔字段创建的筛选器。Filters that are created for each foreign key or Boolean fields. 通过将此特性应用于表示表的分部类, 此类可用于启用或禁用数据模型中的数据表基架。This class can be used to enable or disable scaffolding of data tables in a data model by applying this attribute to the partial class that represents the table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过将基架属性应用于表示错误日志的错误的分部类, 在 AdventureWorksLT 数据库中隐藏错误日志表。The following code example hides the ErrorLog Table in AdventureWorksLT database by applying the scaffold attribute to the ErrorLog partial class that represents the ErrorLog table. 基架属性设置为`false.`The scaffold property is set to `false.` ```csharp [MetadataType (typeof(ErrorLogMetadata))] [ScaffoldTable(false)] public partial class ErrorLog { } public class ErrorLogMetadata { } ``` ```vb _ Public Partial Class ErrorLog End Class Public Class ErrorLogMetadata End Class ``` 若要编译该示例代码, 需要以下各项:To compile the example code, you need the following: - Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 或 Visual Developer 2008 速成版 Service Pack 1。Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 or Visual Developer 2008 Express Edition Service Pack 1. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息, 请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例:GitHub](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)上的数据库。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保为运行的 SQL Server 版本安装了正确版本的示例数据库。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 一个动态数据的网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 这使您可以为数据库创建数据上下文, 并创建包含要自定义的数据字段的类以及要重写的方法。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize and the methods to override. 此外, 它还创建使用之前所述页面的环境。In addition, it creates the environment in which to use the page described before. 有关详细信息，请参见[演练：使用基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)创建新的动态数据网站。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

related.span: 演练：使用基架创建新的动态数据网站

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool scaffold) cil managed

param.name: scaffold
param.span: 用于指定是否启用基架的值。

span.span: The value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

summary.span: 使用 属性初始化 的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于整个数据`scaffold`模型`true` , 您可以将设置为, 以在数据库中公开用于 CRUD (创建、读取、更新和删除) 操作的所有数据表, 或通过将单个表设置`scaffold`为来向 crud 操作公开单独的表`true`.You can set `scaffold` to `true` for the entire data model to expose all data tables in the database for CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) operations or expose individual tables to CRUD operations by setting `scaffold` for individual tables to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scaffold As Boolean
public: property bool Scaffold { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于指定是否启用基架的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that specifies whether scaffolding is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了基架，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基架是基于数据库架构生成网页模板的机制。Scaffolding is the mechanism of generating web page templates based on database schemas. ASP.NET 动态数据使用基架生成基于 Web 的 UI, 该 UI 使用户能够查看和更新数据库。ASP.NET Dynamic Data uses scaffolding to generate Web-based UI that lets a user to view and update a database. 有关基架属性的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about the Scaffold attribute, see .
